column2: Horrifying Extinct Animals Quiz
Questions based on extinct animals ranking worksheet. Test your knowledge about fascinating extinct creatures!

Remember: questions have a limit of 95 characters and answers can have 60 characters max. Text will turn red in Excel or Google Docs if you exceed this limit. If several answers are correct, separate them with a comma.
And remember, if you're not using Excel you need to export to .xlsx format before you upload to Kahoot!
Question - max 95 characters
